name: Project IO (itch)
description:
Project IO is a simple 2D platformer that I have been working on in my spare time for the past 6 months. Wanted to finally finish a game for once. Currently there are only 3 levels, I will add more in the future.

The game is designed for controllers but can be played on keyboard and mouse.

Controller controls:

Move - Left Stick

Jump - A

Dash - X

Pause - Start Button

Keyboard controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Dash - Shift

Pause - Escape
